title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Two Terrorists Eliminated Overnight”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terror targets in southern Lebanon overnight; two Hezbollah terrorists were killed in the area of Kfar Kila.

During the night, combat aircraft from the Air Force attacked terror targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Al-Hiyam area. Among the targets attacked, a number of terror infrastructures used by the organization alongside two other military buildings. In addition, IDF forces fired to remove a threat in the area.

Air Force aircraft eliminated two terrorists from the terrorist organization Hezbollah who were identified in the area of Kfar Kila.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3xGYXyA
